thread.section_title: American Advisors Group Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of American Advisors Group | americanadvisorsgroup.com
thread.title: Janice
thread.title_full: American Advisors Group reviewed by Janice

author: Janice
title: Janice
text: took 5 1/2 months after we were told it would take 2 to 3 months. There were reasons for this,especially on our side, but the wait was very hard. The person we worked with, Robert Carmona, couldn't have been nicer and more helpful. I thank him for all his hard work. Things have gone smoothly since we were approved and received our benefits.
